ServerInfo - Class in org.kawanfw.commons.api.server.util
Gets some server info, including info extracted from HttpServletRequest at server startup.
SessionParameters - Class in org.kawanfw.commons.api.client
Allows to define some parameters for the session: Timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when opening a communications link with the remote server.
SessionParameters() - Constructor for class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Constructor.
setAcceptAllSslCertificates(boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets if client sides must allow HTTPS call with all SSL Certificates, including "invalid" or self-signed Certificates.
setCompressionOn(boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Says if http content is compressed
setConnectTimeout(int) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when opening a communications link to the remote server.
setDownloadChunkLength(long) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets the chunk length in bytes to be used by RemoteInputStream. 0 means files are not chunked.
setEncryptionPassword(char[]) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets the encryption Password that encrypts http request parameters.
setExecutable(boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
A convenience method to set the owner's execute permission for this abstract pathname.
setExecutable(boolean, boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
Sets the owner's or everybody's execute permission for this abstract pathname.
setHtmlEncodingOn(boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Says if the upload/download of Clob using character stream or ASCII stream must be html encoded.
setLastModified(long) - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
Sets the last-modified time of the file or directory named by this abstract pathname.
setMaxLengthForString(int) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets the maximum authorized length in bytes for a string for upload or download (in order to avoid OutOfMemoryException on client and server side).
setReadable(boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
A convenience method to set the owner's read permission for this abstract pathname.
setReadable(boolean, boolean) - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
Sets the owner's or everybody's read permission for this abstract pathname.
setReadOnly() - Method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.RemoteFile
Marks the file or directory named by this abstract pathname so that only read operations are allowed.
setReadTimeout(int) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets the read timeout to a specified timeout, in milliseconds.
setUploadChunkLength(long) - Method in class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.SessionParameters
Sets the chunk length in bytes to be used by RemoteOutputStream. 0 means files are not chunked.
setUseBase64EncodingForCall() - Static method in class org.kawanfw.file.api.client.FileSession
Deprecated.
Says if we want to use base64 encoding for parameters passed to call() - This is a method for legacy applications prior to v1.0.

SshAuthCommonsConfigurator - Class in org.kawanfw.commons.api.server
A concrete CommonsConfigurator that extends DefaultCommonsConfigurator and allows zero-code client (usernname, password) authentication using SSH.
